property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The label for assistive devices to announce. If unspecified, the value will be used instead.

property.name: size
property.label: Size
property.description: The size of the QR code, in pixels.

property.name: fill
property.label: Fill Color
property.description: The fill color. This can be any valid CSS color.

property.name: background
property.label: Background Color
property.description: The background color. This can be any valid CSS color or transparent.

property.name: radius
property.label: Radius
property.description: The edge radius of each module. Must be between 0 and 0.5

property.name: errorCorrection
property.label: Error Correction
property.description: The level of error correction to use. Equivalent to 7 (L), 15 (M), 25 (Q), 30% (H)
